localizedDescriptions.en: Interaction, contact or care event between a subject of care and healthcare provider(s).
A generic section header which should be renamed in a template to suit a specific clinical context.
Affiliation, kinship or connection with one or more groupings of people, according to common origins or background.
The hereditary or genetic line origins of the individual.

annotations.comment: For example: English; Irish; Chinese; Italian; Aboriginal; Torres Strait Islander; Maori; Inuit or Ashkenazi Jew. Coding with a terminology is preferred, where possible. The occurrences for this data element is set to multiple occurrences to allow for more than one social grouping to be selected.
